The Hideaway.knownFor: “ Grab a drink! ” Reviewed September 14, 2013 The Hideaway has been here for a long time. Its a cool little bar tucked into the mountainside in Wofford Heights. If youre camping in the area its a good place to have a drink and cool down. Locals like to hang out here and are friendly. Great bar for anyone! Helpful? 1 Thank NavyDevilDoc Report
